main event: A United Airlines pilot reported observing a flying object that displayed tremendous speed while flying parallel to the aircraft.
interesting points: The reported UFO had the color of fire and was round on top and flat on the bottom., The sighting occurred over Altoona, Pennsylvania., The object was seen for about one minute by the pilot and a controller., The aircraft was at an altitude of 15,220 feet with a ground speed of 332 mph., The conclusion of the analysis was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: a flying object with the color of fire and a round top, flat bottom
witness description: a United Airlines pilot and a controller from New York ARTCC
